reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and well-fitting, with sleeves that are good length and not too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!
items.body: This sweater is very nice. I ordered a size large in both the apricot and brown; the size is accurate, the colors are beautiful, and the quality is great! The material is light weight and very soft. One thing I really appreciate about this sweater is the wider cuff at the bottom. So many sweaters I see in stores are wide at the bottom, but this one is more snug and does not seem like it will stretch out. I haven't yet washed either sweater yet, so I don't know for certain if they will pill, but as of right now, I really like this sweater, especially because I only paid $12.99 each. A bargain! I plan to wear the with the collared-dickies I also bought from Amazon a while back. Read more
items.author: joel dalba

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GOOD BUY!
items.body: It is a pretty sweater. It is soft and well made. Not heavy at all. You can wear it with nice slacks or skirt. It also would be perfect with jeans. Color and style was perfect for me. It was a good price too. Read more
items.author: kathy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater for Florida Fall/Winter
items.body: It‚Äôs a great sweater. It‚Äôs soft, not too long and not too short. It‚Äôs just the right weight for Florida in the winter. I took one star off because the color red in the picture looks red-orange to me, more orange for Fall is what I wanted. I‚Äôm keeping it for Christmas. Besides, who doesn‚Äôt like red for most any day? It‚Äôs a wonderful shade of red, medium bright. I am a Color Me Spring and cherry red is the shade for me. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5, 139 lbs. athletic build I‚Äôm short- waisted. This sweater falls in just the correct spot. It could be great for the office, the office party or super casual. I‚Äôm gonna order another color right now! Read more
items.author: Marcella Snider

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Cozy, Polished Casual.
items.body: Soft n cozy- 3 compliments first day wearing it. I did wash in cold water and lay flat to dry. No shrinkage. Very very mild ‚Äúpeels though, yet not very noticeable. Will continue to cold wash/lay flat dry. Fit is nice and comfortable. Nice wear. Sleeves are good length. I‚Äôm now a large in most tops (5‚Äô51/2‚Äù- 156#‚Äôs (menopause set in üò©). App suggests M, so I ordered M.. fits great, not baggy, great under my blazers for a casual polished look. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
items.body: Lightweight and soft texture. It is not see through and is true to size. It can go with just about anything as black is a good color and can be casual or dressed up. Read more
items.author: beverly m.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Well Made!
items.body: It‚Äôs fall so I decided to replace a few old pieces in my closet. I purchased this sweater after reading the reviews and I‚Äôm so glad I did. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù, 138 lbs, 36B, and purchased a medium in brown. I love this sweater! its soft as can be, has a nice stretch, feels very well made, and the fit is perfect. I usually wear a small, but I wanted something with a little looser fit and the Medium is perfect. The shoulder seam is right at my shoulders, arm length is to my wrist, and around the middle it‚Äôs not baggy but just right. The color is a soft light brown and will go with jeans, winter white, or even black. I have one more arriving tomorrow in Caramel and might just purchase one or two more. Don‚Äôt hesitate to buy this, it‚Äôs a keeper! Read more
items.author: NorCal Ellen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great closet staple piece
items.body: Looking for a everyday sweater? This is the one. Very light and very comfortable. I received this a few weeks ago and have worn 4 times already- so comfortable and so easy to dress up or down. Fits true to size Read more
items.author: Wendy D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Sweater
items.body: Fabric quality is great, cozy sweater - true to size Color is very pretty Read more
items.author: Ann O'Leary

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, T-chocolate Brown+apricot, Apricot, S-chocolate Brown+white Striped, Black, S-grey Purple+white Striped, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Red, Cream White, S-apricot+white Striped, Caramel, Grey Purple, S-black+white Striped. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
